name: Hardware Repairs
description: Hardware repair technicians repair physical equipment such as computer hardware, office machinery, laptops, automatic teller machines (ATMs) and desktop computers. Read on for some pros and cons of working as a hardware repair technician to see if it seems like the right fit for you.

name: Virus Removal
description: Why take on the hassle of hunting down pesky pop-ups, Trojans and cyber-bugs when you can have an expert do it quickly and easily? You can even ask them questions while they work! So, relax and leave the dirty work to us.

name: System Tuneup
description: Is your computer running slow? If you’re experiencing slowdowns when trying to complete simple tasks on your computer, you most likely need a computer tune-up. Similar to many other machines, like a car, your computer needs regular maintenance and cleanups to ensure it’s running at its highest potential.
